E

EventFetcherStatsMBean - Interface in com.cubeia.firebase.server.event.processing

F

forceCleanupDisconnects() - Method in interface com.cubeia.firebase.server.gateway.GatewayNodeMBean
This method runs the client connection reaper and removes all clients in a DISCONNECT status regardless how long they have been disconnected.
